long_description: The men's SmartWool Hiking Ultra-Light Mini Socks combine soft, breathable merino wool with low-profile style to deliver maximum comfort with minimal coverage. Merino wool provides excellent temperature control and moisture management, so you're warm when it's cold and cool when it's warm. WOW (wool on wool) technology increases wool content in high-impact areas, improving durability and overall comfort. High-density impact zones under heels and forefeet (where impact is greatest) protect against shock and abrasion. Mesh ventilation zones, an arch brace and ultralight cushioning ensure comfort without bulkiness. Hiking Ultra-Light Mini Socks feature multiribbed cuffs and flat-knit toe seams. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The men's SmartWool Hiking Ultra-Light Mini Socks combine soft, breathable merino wool with low-profile style to deliver maximum comfort with minimal coverage.
